NotFoundPage.title: Page not found
NotFoundPage.info: It seems we have lost this page in the virtual wilds. Please use the navigation above to find your way, or return to the main page to start over.

Cookie.title: We use cookies
Cookie.description: It's safe: cookies are stored only on your device. If you don't mind, click «Accept all cookies» or continue browsing the site.

banner.title:
Turnkey landing pages from 14 days with
24/7 support
banner.description: Landing pages that bring in customers, increase sales and pay for themselves from the first orders.

objections.title: Doubt whether your business needs a landing page?
items: A landing page is long and expensive to develop
Social networks are enough for promotion
A landing page will not bring in customers and will not pay for itself
You will have to constantly update and support it.
It's too complicated: you need a designer, a programmer and a bunch of other specialists.

missed_chance.title: Result?
missed_chance.description: Every day without a landing page, you miss opportunities that will never come back:

list.title: Lost profits
list.description: Your products and services are left without a buyer, and the income goes into someone else's pockets.

list.title: Limited Entry Points for Customers
list.description: Without a landing page, your business misses opportunities to attract clients from search engines, ads, and other independent channels.

list.title: Missed hot requests
list.description: Without a landing page, your customers cannot quickly contact you or leave an order.

list.title: Delay in scaling your business
list.description: Without a website, you lose a tool that increases the volume of orders and allows you to work more efficiently.

tips: Profits are being taken away by competitors

solution.title: There is a solution. A landing page that attracts clients and increases sales.
solution.description: A website that brings in applications, works 24/7 and does not depend on social networks or VPN.

list.title: Audience reach grows without unnecessary costs.
list.description: A landing page increases your position in search, collects information in one place and makes your business visible to clients.

list.title: The landing page works for you 24/7.
list.description: Customers can leave a request or buy your product at any time, even at night, without unnecessary correspondence.

list.title: The landing page is always available, wherever the client is.
list.description: Your site works even if social networks are blocked and clients do not use VPN.

portfolio.title: The best proof is our clients' results

items.description:
BAC Training Center


Project Goal:

Development of a modern landing page for the British Academic Centre training center in order to improve user experience and increase conversion of course registrations.


Development Process:

The Elysium team analyzed the target audience and competitors, developed a prototype and implemented an adaptive landing page using HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript, ensuring high performance and ease of use.


Results:

The finished landing page successfully increased the number of applications through the feedback form and became a universal solution for mobile and desktop devices, corresponding to the goals of the training center.

Training center «BAC»

Results:

The finished landing page successfully increased the number of applications via the feedback form and became a universal solution for mobile and desktop devices, corresponding to the goals of the training center.
